content.detailedDescription: Was out side shooting deep sky objects in ursa major and saw this glowing object about the size of the full moon. aimed the 102 mm scope with digital camera at it and started shooting. it made no engine noise. in my finderscope i noticed an amber light on the right side and a white light on the left that were not blinking. the object looked like a vehicle with a cloud surrounding it.
content.summary: Glowing object heading from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
on june 22 at 11:45p.M. i was sitting around the fire with my brother, my wife and a friend when i noticed that my wife and brother are both staring up at the sky. before i knew it the four of us had our eyes locked on an object that seemed to have a very undefined shape, could stop in mid flight and change direction instantly.
 when i first looked up i assumed that i was looking at a plane, even though i could not make out a definitive shape. but soon it was obvious to all of us that we were not looking at a plane when the craft's flight pattern changed numerous times.
 when i looked to the sky, the object was a dull light with what appeared to be a small cloud or smoke that was following it around covering it. i watched it for a moment, then i realized it was making some very unusual turns. we all watch it's aerobatics for a few minutes then i remember commenting "it's so blurry , it's hard to make out a shape". almost instantly, it stopped in midair, to the north of us and the white lit up cloud disappeared to reveal some what smaller craft, or a yellow/orange/red colored light which sat there for 30 seconds or so then just disappeared all together.
 all of us left the bonfire that night feeling that we witnessed something very important, something none of us had ever witnessed before. something it has been difficult to stop thinking about.
content.summary: My freinds and i saw a foggy looking vehicle flying above coshocton. i commented that it was hard see a definitive shape. it stopped, i seen it clearly, then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At 1st, of the moon. then i look.And from the corner of ch of the 2 stars where on diferent. sides on
content.summary: I step out to smocke a cigarette and look at the moon and saw what look like.2 stars.  one on each side of the moon. ing browsing the web, and fe

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on a rural county road. the craft flew over the road in front of me. i thought it might be drone.  the object seemed have a metal frame with a white surface and no wings about the size of a mid sized car.  it accelerated over the field to the right of the county road. the craft slightly adjusted direction continued south west. i lost visual contact within a few seconds.
content.summary: Framed craft with no wings or visible propulsion

content.detailedDescription:
I was swimming in my parents pool on a hot summer night with a friend.
it was about 3 a.M. in the morning when i was exiting out the pool. i was standing on the latter of the pool to step down when i saw a black triangle shaped craft hover over my parents house. it moved slow over the pool and i noticed three orange yellow like orbs on the bottom of the craft. one on each corner. the craft made no noise at all. it suddenly took off over the trees at the speed of light and disappeared into the dark.My heart dropped and me and my friend raced inside scared and confused of what we just encountered. we never seen anything like it in our lives. ever since that night we both became believer that there is defiantly something more out there....
content.summary: Very low hovering black triangle shaped object with three orange yellow orbs on the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
On june 18, 2015 at around 9:30pm my dad noticed a red light hovering in the sky. it was in the distance (roughly 20-30 miles away) and was roughly about 20,000 feet in the air. then a second light appeared close to the first. we thought it was the wing lights of some sort of plane, but the distance between the lights would have meant the plane had the biggest wingspan we’ve ever seen. then a third red light appeared and we realized it was three separate objects. they all hovered in a horizontal line. almost immediately after the third light appeared, the first one quickly dimmed and disappeared. then the second light dimmed and disappeared. after that, the third light began to rapidly fly straight up hundreds of feet in only a fraction of a second. then it instantly came to a complete stop. it began to fly around rapidly in all different directions. it would take off at speeds faster than i’ve ever seen a plane fly, then instantly stop and hover in midair. it didn’t need any time to accelerate. it would fly erratically in the air, changing directions 180 degrees in an instant without having to slow down. it could have flown circles around any airplane or helicopter with ease. after a few minutes it just disappeared. 
about 20 minutes later, the three red lights appeared again, in the same order and formation as the first time. the first two lights disappeared in the same order as before, and the third light proceeded to fly erratically, but for a shorter time than before. then it disappeared.
after another 20 or 30 minutes two red lights appeared again, in a horizontal line, but were much farther apart. this viewing is harder to explain. they hovered in place just like before. then, slowly, a second red light flew out from behind each of the two lights (on the right side of one light, and on the left side of the other light). then another light came out from the behind the other side of each light (on the left side of one light, and on the right side of the other light), which equaled two sets of three lights. at this time all six of the lights were in a perfect horizontal line, with a set of three lights that was a far distance from the other set of three lights. then, the two outer lights slowly flew back in behind each center light, and the center lights became much brighter. the two outer lights continued to fly back in from the center lights, and back out from the center lights, causing the brightness of the center lights to increase and decrease. then they all disappeared. 
finally, about another 20-30 minutes later, one red light appeared in the sky, much farther than where the rest had appeared. it hovered there for about one minute, and disappeared. 
this happened when we were camping in the middle of nowhere in the nevada desert. we estimated the lights to be coming from in between the monte cristo range and lone mountain, which is between coaldale, nv and tonopah, nv.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed red lights flying in the sky of the nevada desert between coaldale and tonopah.

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were driving down the road when i pointed out hovering lights in the distance.  we pulled over to the side of the road at watched the craft hover like a helicopter but with no sound.  we observed multicolor lights blinking off and on in a steady pattern.  after about 10 minutes the craft took off in a ne direction and upwards faster than any craft i had ever seen.
content.summary: Hovering craft that was stationary for 10 minutes then took off in a flash

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to begin by restating my desire remain anonymous.  in may 2013 (on or about the 30th) my wife and i were traveling south on highway 84 near the colorado /new mexico boarder on our way to tx.  approximately 20 minutes after sunset behind the mountains, yet while there was still enough light to see beyond the reach of headlights we were passing an open sage brush field to the east, we both noticed two large, chevron shaped objects rise up out of the ground.  both objects were silent in their operation and had lights illuminating downward from each leading point and at the end of each wing.  

i would estimate our speed of travel as approximately 70 mph and were traveling in a large 3/4 ton truck, giving us an elevated view of the roadway and surrounding terrain.  the objects were not initially visible but seemed to rise either off of or out of the ground as we approached their location near the highway.  highway 84 is very rural and there were not any other vehicles in the area at the time.  i slowed slightly, and regrettably was somewhat in disbelief as to what we were both witnessing.  as we slowed we were climbing a rise in the highway which curved toward the top.  given the geography of the area we quickly lost visual on the objects.  my wife and i were both at a loss for words and were struggling to comprehend what we both just witnessed.  

my wife and i are both very well educated professionals in our community.  i am trained to be observant to detail.  i am familiar with and have more than a cursory knowledge of most military and commercial aircraft - these were neither; although i will concede they could possibly have been very large, silent, vertical take-off type drone that may not yet have been made public.  that being said, i would have no explanation as to their presence in the field that evening.  

i had traveled through the area previous to our encounter and have been through twice since - on both occasions i pulled to the side of the road near where we witnessed the objects, attempting to simply male sense of what we observed, but have been unable to do so.
content.summary: Witnessed two objects ascend from a field at dusk.  no sound, vertical take-off.
content.locationName: Between Chama, NM & Chrom, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription: On june 3rd, 2015, we noticed an object in the sky, hovering.  it was off in the distant and appeared to have sporadic flashing lights.  after a couple of hours, the object vanishes.  sometimes there are multiple objects.  the object makes an appearance often. we have seen this object multiple times, and in different locations.  it seems to be far away, but i've watched it with binoculars and it looks like a spinning disk.  when i zoom in on my camera, i can see the object closer and it is almost definitely a spinning disk.  the problem is that my camera reacts strangely to it and there's almost like a "streak" or "zap" that doesn't allow me to take the picture zoomed in.  today i was able to get a few pictures.  the object also changes colors, red, green, blue.  i am perplexed.  i have no idea what these objects are.  these objects seem to hover in the sky for up to a few hours, rotating with flashing lights, then it ascends or descends out of sight in the blink of an eye.
content.summary: There is a spinning disc that has been making repeated visits for the past 20 days.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to take a pic of orangish crescent moon.  stop i the bathroom then stood on the deck & there it was hovering adjacent to the right of side of the moon.  1 min or so later it zipped off out of site in 1 sec.

it was about 1:30am hovering over longview, wa.  it was hard to tell the distance do to it being a clear evening and it was high in the sky.  this is the second sighting in one year.  the first one was near of my house in kelso, wa (very large - 5 miles away).

this one... i was alone and i checked all websites that receive reports, news, and youtube.  nothing!  i am not saying it was a e.T. ufo but i am retired military and am not sure what it was.  it wasn't a flare, chinese lantern, weather phenomenon (i.E. lighting ball or gases).  all i know is i observed it just long enough for a picture.  i started to set my phone to video and when i looked up to aim my camera phone it went north toward seattle.  it was fast.  in fact so fast it almost looked like it just disappeared.
content.summary: side of the moon.  1 min or so later zipped off out of site in 1 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
I stopped by the grocery store on the way home from work this evening and as i was driving north on my way home, the time was between 5:30 - 5:43 pm. the road i take has an area that has small hills that curve to the right and as i'm driving up the hill, i see a commercial airplane that looked like it was ascending in the sky as if it left the airport, which by the way i don't live very far from an international airport but what caught my attention was i thought two planes were going to collide. as the airplane passes in sky, i see the other object just there hovering but it looked like it was moving very slowly. the object to me looked like a dark grey, metallic football shape from side profile.  i'm still driving but slow in the left lane, (amazingly there was not a lot of traffic at that time), anyhow, i'm driving and looking up and it's still there, slowly moving way off in the horizon to the east in the sky. i keep doing this until i drive along a stretch of house with large trees which blocks my view and after driving past this area. i don't see it anymore! i'm still driving wondering what it is? i keep looking and driving, until i come to a stop light and i look everywhere in the sky while waiting for the light to turn green. although, it was no longer visible while driving home, i still kept looking for it until my route took me to the west.
my thought is, this shape is not normal. i've lived in this area for over 25 years and have never seen such a unusual shape in the sky! i did question what i saw, as of now, i don't know what is was and was wondering if anyone else saw it and reported it? i didn't stop to take a cell phone picture or video because i was somewhat in a hurry and also i wasn't sure what it was? besides my cell phone doesn't take good pics or videos. i told only my immediate family and my husband doesn't believe me and he's the one who's all into this kind of stuff!
i do know many people from this area that have seen ufo's. all credible people. my brother keeps telling us he's seen them in this area at least twice, at the time i questioned whether he really did see them or not but i certainly believe him now! actually, never in my lifetime did i ever think i'd see something like that. something that i could not explain? ~ thank you for your time. ~
content.summary: Driving home after stopping at the grocery store after work today

content.detailedDescription: My husband was taking out the garbage when he saw 2 sets of glowing stop sign shaped orbs moving slowly and silently just above the treetops in a nw direction. he called me out to see. the orbs glowed from red to yellow to white then orange. the pattern then changed to a boomerang shape consisting of approx. 10 orbs. they glided along silently then disappeared behind the clouds. i told my mother about it the next day and she too saw them in the same direction. she had been over a mile away. these were not man made.
content.summary: 2 stop sign shaped groups of glowing orbs that changed into boomerang shape then disappeared. silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was just finishing up a 45 day hitch consulting for horizontal drilling at a chevron job site. i took a nap on my office couch because i had a long drive. i woke up around midnight and signed out with the medic. it was mid winter, snowing quite a bit and i get about 3-4km down the road and i see something that i could feel had i very high level of sophistication sprinted across the road from 20ft on one side of the road to 20ft on the other side and fast. i got a huge hit of adrenaline and hit the gas i called my brother and said "chris i don't know what i just seen but it was tall and it was white".. i was scared to death. i was sure i just saw something i wasn't supposed to. i couple months later i was at my brothers house and i watched the honourable paul hellyer"s disclosure on extra terrestrial's. he said something about "the tall whites" just seeing that sent shivers down my spine. again i was scared to death, i showed my brother he couldn't believe it. it was a new video clip but i told him what i seen months earlier.
content.summary: Seen something run across the road.

content.detailedDescription:
Observing the moon through a telescope 
i asked my wife if she thought it was an airplane, she said she didn't know 
i knew it wasn't an airplane 
very straight pattern, noticed it while observing the moon
i took a video with my phone 
i lost it in the eastern horizon
content.summary: Very consistent, however no con trail and silent

content.detailedDescription:
this is a picture of me taken in 1956.  i was around 5 or 6 years old.  this picture is relevant to the story i am about to tell you.  notice my age of innocence.  notice the season of the year.  notice the clothing i am wearing.  the picture was taken in the backyard of the house we were renting on main street in commerce.  a small 2 bedroom house that needed to accommodate my mom and dad, my two sisters and i, not to mention our dog, bubbles, and my pet turtles.
	it began on a winter's day close to end of the season.  the winter had been bitterly cold and i was unable to go outdoors and play.  dad had put up a swing set in the yard to the east of the house that previous summer.  not only did it have 2 swings it also included a sliding board and a teeter totter.  i could scarcely wait for the weather to warm up so i could take advantage of that fun just waiting to happen.
     during this time mom worked at home, mostly babysitting and taking in ironing.  she hated to iron but she did it for the sake of the family.  i remember many a day watching her iron her way through a stack of laundry, a stack literally taller than me.  she did the ironing in the living room, the only room big enough for the job.  it was on such a morning's day that the cold of winter subsided and mom said i could go out and play on the swing set as long as i bundled up.  she said it would take at least five hours for her to finish the ironing, then she had to wash dishes and do some house cleaning.
	joy unspeakable.  i couldn't get my coat on fast enough.  look at the picture of me again.  the coat and hat i was wearing in the picture was the exact coat and hat i was wearing now.  rushing out the front door with that child like desire to play, it was impossible to hold myself back.  a bright light was in the way of me and the swing set.  it was an odd, intensely bright light in front of the swing set shining down from the sky like a spotlight hitting the ground directly in front of me.
 for me 1956 was a time of innocence.  i was young and had none to very little exposure to stories about bright lights coming down from the sky, alien encounters, or ufo's.
 the incident i am now continuing to tell you happened.  it was not a night dream or a day dream, not my imagination from watching tv or playing superman, not an elaborate hoax i have conceived to entertain you.  this is the absolute truth.  it did happen!  as i put this event into writing i am 64 years old and still feel like it happened yesterday.  it is vivid in my mind.  it is burned into my mind forever.  i have told few people my story for fear of ridicule.  after all even my mother never believed me.  upon hearing the story on the very day it happened she said, “you were just having a daydream, just playing like you were superman.  it really didn't happen.”
	believe me or not, here goes..........
	as i approached the light it was blindingly bright.  it was coming from the sky as far up as i could see.  it was in the shape of a spotlight wide enough to swallow me completely if i were to step into it.  my anticipation of playing on the swings ignored the light in the direct path of my goal.  running forward i ran into the light.  the light enveloped me with a brilliance so intense it was overwhelming.  i felt awestruck as well as frightened.  the light captured me like an animal in a trap.  i could move my arms but i could not escape from the light.  it held me!
	there was an upward force on my body.  it felt like a magnet pulling on me.  i felt weightless.  looking uncomprehendingly around me, i began to rise off the ground.  the light somehow was pulling me through its corridor toward the sky.  has something gone dreadfully wrong with my mind, was i hallucinating?  no, it was actually happening.  i was rising in the air.  it was not a vivid dream.  it was genuine.  it was happening!
	looking down i could see all of the yard then the roof of the house.  rising further i could see the block my house was in.  then i could see the entire town of commerce, all of the streets and the houses.  it was as if i were viewing the town from an airplane.  higher and higher, becoming more terrorized with each passing moment.
	out of the light i heard a voice; more like i felt the voice through every fiber of my being.  the voice reminds me of the earthquake we experienced a few months ago in november of 2011.  the earthquake is the first one i ever experienced.  it rumbled like thunder through the house, shaking the walls and vibrating the floor.  lasting only 20 seconds it left me with the feeling of an awesome power passing through the house.  i felt the earthquake in my entire body as the earth shook with the unnerving vibrations.
	as powerful as the voice felt it was a soothing voice, a calming voice.  at the time i thought it was god speaking to me.
	“do not be afraid,” the voice softly spoke.
	“why are you taking me?  where are you taking me?” i apprehensively asked.
	“to take you from the troubles to come,” the voice replied.
	“no, i don't want to go,” i answered.
	“you are chosen, we are here to take you” the voice explained.
	“i want my mom.  i do not want to go.  don't take me.  i am afraid,” i pleaded.
	“it is your choice.  we will not force you.  please consider carefully your decision.  we are here to help you escape things to come.  to show you wonders yet unseen,” they proclaimed.
	“no, send me back,” i spoke with fear.
	“take off your coat and let it drop to the earth as a sign to us you have chosen to stay with your family and this world full of its corruption.”
	quickly taking off my coat i let it fall down the tunnel of light still connecting me with my yard.  the coat drifted slowly.  when it hit the ground i found myself standing on the back porch of our house.
	“how did i get on the back porch,” i asked myself confusedly.  “what happened to the light, it was gone.”
	the back porch was screened in and had a door leading in from the steps.  i pushed on the door to go out.  the door was locked from the inside.
	“how did i get in here if the door is locked?” i asked myself.
	“maybe through the door that leads into the kitchen.” i thought.  trying that door, it was locked too.  locked and i could not enter the house.
	“i don't understand this, how did i get on the porch with both doors locked?”
	unlocking the screen door i left the porch, went around the house past the swing set, to the front door.  i burst through the front door as white as a sheet and barely able to talk.  looking for mom to tell her what had just happened to me.
	she was not in the living room.  moments ago she was.  she had been ironing a stack of clothes.  the clothes had all been ironed and neatly folded.  the ironing board had been put away.  the dishes were washed.  the house had been cleaned.  then i noticed it was beginning to get dark.  how could that be, it was morning.  how could all the clothes be ironed, the dishes washed, and the house cleaned.  i had just been in the house a minute ago.  where on earth did the day go?  a minute ago to me was over 9 hours of time.  i lost over 9 hours of time.  where was i?  why couldn't i remember living through the 9 hours.  just a minute had passed!
	mom was in her bedroom when i found her.  i told her about the light and the voice in the light.  how i had dropped my coat through the tunnel of light because i didn't want to leave her.  i told her how i found myself on the back porch but i had not entered the porch on my own.
	she dismissed it as a daydream.  she said i was just playing superman.  that none of what i said had happened.  she said it was impossible.
	she tried to reason with me.  “you could not have been gone for over 9 hours without me knowing about it.  i would have checked on you.”
	she would have checked on me!  i had no answer for that.
	“other people would have seen the light, no one reported it but you.”
	i couldn't answer to that either.
	i had no proof.  then i remembered, “what about my coat, i'm not wearing it.  where is it?
	we walked outside by the swing set and found my coat laying on the ground where i had dropped it through the light.
	“see,” i said, “there it is!”
	“you took it off when you were playing and left it by the swing set.”
	“no, mom.  i dropped it down through the light.”
	“you were playing make believe and convinced yourself it was real.”
	i couldn't convince her.  to this very day she tells me it was just a dream.  i still have no proof.  i one hundred percent believe it happened.  i had an opportunity to go on a journey to somewhere but i blew it, i was so afraid.  i wonder what my life would have been like if i had left my coat on. 

     footnote:  after the day of the light i did have other encounters.
content.summary: A bright light lifted me off the ground resulting in missing time.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on a porch outside, talking with a visitor, we both noticed a long green streak flying/falling through the sky, was a long trail of green fire with blue/orange at the tail end. fireball looked like it disintegrated in mid air above tree line, could not see anything hit the ground. we think the object was a comet of some sort, i have never seen a comet fall but i feel like it was strange being green fire and being as large as the streak was.
content.summary: Green fireball falling from sky with orange colored tail disintegrated in mid air

content.detailedDescription: On 6/22/15,at 10:30 pm central,my wife and i were outside watching the very bright and intense northern lights. i looked to the south,and a bit east,and i saw what at first looked to me like a huge fuzzy comet nucleus.It surprised me,and i remember saying to her,what the hell is that thing?I then realized that it was moving in our direction,so i ran in the house and got my cheap binoculars.I found it with my binoculars,and it was very strange.It was just a huge,greenish,misty/foggy ball heading towards us.It was going to pass directly overhead.When it got to be at about an 80 degree angle[just before overhead] to me,i could suddenly see a very small,orange-ish colored orb that seemed to be leading this much larger fuzzy ball.When it got to be about 85 degrees to me,all of a sudden i could see straight up into this fuzzy green ball,and inside of it was an object,surrounded by fog or haze,and it was giving off an intense,brilliant white light,but the light was only shining to the northeast.These objects were heading north and a little west,and when it got to be 90 degrees to me,or directly overhead,the haze or mist seemed to clear somewhat,and i was looking straight up at this thing in the center of the mist or haze.I want to say the object in the center was a large,dark sphere,and on the leading edge,but on the northeast part,it was as if there was a port or a door or something that was open,and the most brilliant and intense white light was shining out of it,but it only was shining to the northeast.I say the light was shining out of a port or a door,because the lite came out in a wedge shape,and the lite had shadow in it from the edges of whatever it was shining out of,and also,the light was casting shadow on the edges of whatever the the object was that the light was shining out of.After the object got to be at about 100 degrees[just past overhead],the thing in the center again became enshrouded and hidden again by the fog.So now,again,it looked like a comet nucleus,or a fuzzy ball.All this time,this thing appeared to be lead by this small orb in front of it.By the time it got to be around 120 degrees of me,it was getting harder to see because of the intense northern lights.But,i did observe a second small orange orb come from inside the large fuzzy ball,and slowly make its way straight towards the small,leading orb.The 2nd orb merged with the lead orb for about 10 seconds,then it slowly made its way straight back to the large fuzzy ball.After that,the object was fully immersed in the northern lights,and even through my binoculars,which i used to observe this whole event,i finally lost sight of it.During this event,the sky was clear,the object made no noise,and it moved in a straight line,from south and a little east,to north and a little west.
content.summary: Observed mist/haze enshrouded object emiting intense white lite,moving from se to nw,passing diectly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down yonkers ave next to the yonkers race track. when i looked up i saw 5 circles of lights about 50-100 ft above. i stooped the car right in the lane i was driving and got out . the lights then started to change spots in the line up. it was instantaneous it would happen in a blink of an eye. i continued to watch them for 10 minutes. and the all of a sudden when i pointed to them to someone who was walking by the shot straight up without a sound and were gone. i felt nothing from the  ufo's but i was in shock and awe of the speed and shape and bright color.
content.summary: My wife and i saw 5 circle shaped lights in the sky and they were changing positions in the blink of an eye. they started in a straight line but then started to move , one would move from the left and appear on the rights side

content.detailedDescription: In december of 2001, in a small camp in la mision mexico, a large group of boys witnessed a large ufo spotlighting a piece of mountain behind our property. we were all sitting outside eating a snack when one of the boys started yelling for everyone to come quick, that there was something in the sky. i ran around the back of the house to see a large disc/bell shaped object beaming a spotlight up and down the side of the mountain in a sweeping motion. it almost looked like it was searching for something. the bottom of the craft looked like a disc within a disc, with one part spinning clockwise and the inner part spinning in the opposite direction. the top of the craft stuck up out of the disc almost like the top of a bell. there were multiple flashing lights coming from the disc part of the craft with faint lights coming from top portion of what i thought could be windows. i was stopped dead in my tracks. i had never seen anything like what i was looking at before in my life. we couldnt look away. a few of us attempted to run towards the part of the mountain that it was spotlighting, but our counselers stopped us immediatley. it hovered in the same spot for maybe 4-5 minutes shining the beam of light from it the whole time. all of a sudden the entire sky flashed so bright i had to look away. when we looked back up, the ufo was gone leaving only a purple cloud that hung in the air for over a hour. while i may never know exactly what it was that i saw, i will never be able to forget it.
content.summary: Witnessed a disc/bell shaped object spotlighting the side of a mountain before disappearing into a flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: Driving over bridge with girfriend & newborn daughter seen police on top of bridge stopping traffic & looking up seen giant spacecraft itlooked like raw black iron about 3 football fields long it looked like steam was comming out of holes. then we went around traffic up to policetold police we had a new born in car. he told us to procedeto other side of bridge at bottom of bridge another police car stopped us a i informed officer we had newbornin car he ask us were we lived i said down the block. he told us to gohome
content.summary: Me my girlfiebd & are newborn daughter apprix. 3week yo were in car going over bridge police at. top of bridge stopping traffic look up a hudge craft about 3  hundred yards wide hovering. it looked like raw bkack iron with steam comming out of it.  tol

content.detailedDescription:
I have sent two other sighting of a similar object starting with case number 59412.

i first observed the object from my front porch moving extremely slow beneath the clouds from the west headed east.  this was 9:51 pm.  i hurried back inside and grabbed both my disposable and digital camera.  i also called my mom to get her to see it as well.  as it moved slowly across the sky, i took as many pictures as i could hoping for it to show up this time.

after 5-6 minutes, it came to a stop almost directly north.  a smaller red light came up from behind the tree line and merged with/entered the object.  then the object slowly lowered below the tree line.  it was out of sight for approx. 45 seconds and appeared climbing higher into the sky.  it stopped to hover again, another smaller red object emerged from the side of it and sped off to the northeast at a very high rate of speed.  

the main object slowly worked it's way up doing an occasional zig zag or "v" movement similar to my other reports.  within a few minutes, it had climbed out of sight.  when i lost sight of the object it was 10:09 pm.  

there was no "lightening" this time.  though the same creepy feeling and dead quiet persisted through the whole encounter.

of all the pictures i took, it only appears in one of them.  the date stamp is wrong because i hadn't set it yet after changing the batteries.  the other is zoomed in view and slight brightened.
content.summary: I observed a slow moving object with multicolored blinking lights merge with one red light and expell another.

content.detailedDescription: North of downtown seattle looking at a eagle flying high above. i got my 7x50 binoculars to see it better. much higher i could see the silver relection of what i thought could be the space station. i watched it never move for 4 minutes. finally i rested my arms from holding binos above my head. i went to get a spotting scope with 60x so i could see more clearly, and could never find it again.
content.summary: Looked like a reflective silver balloon. but hovered  at least 4 minutes without moving.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 8, 2015 at 9:12 pm, i was looking at the planet jupiter and decided to take some video with the intention of modifying the focus.  my intention was to observe the effects of increasing the size of the image over normal basic image integrity and detail.  the direction was basically west at 261° and 36° altitude when i shot 48 seconds of video.  
 
upon review of frame by frame images, i discovered that three separate craft flew by the planet from my perspective of view.  attached are some images.                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                         
it was pure luck that i even saw the craft.  had i been using a normal focal point, jupiter would have been rendered to just a small bright dot and i would not have caught the images of the three craft that flew nearby in the sky.  my initial thought was that the distance of the craft from me was 2 to 3 miles.

the first craft flew in a straight line upwards to the left at a 25° angle.   the second craft did the same, but at a 50° angle.  the third craft actually came from the lower left and did some curving around the planet before continuing on upwards to the right at about a 40° angle.  clearly craft were flying around without lights that evening.

after researching it, the direction of the sightings was toward the lakewood lakes.   two of the craft appear to travel from the southern end of the lake and one from the northern side of the most westerly of the two lakes.   the lake is at a distance of 2.5 miles from me and the craft appear to be 172 yds in length, according to my calculations.   they could have been closer, or further away.  but it is the closest large lake in that area.   most of my observations have been over blue springs lake and lake jacomo.  logic tells me that this is occurring here as well.  

i have seen another very large craft on two occasions over blue springs lake that was approximately 117 yds in length.  one of the dates was in a report of that sighting on november 16, 2014.  these three appear to be 47% larger.  the sighting also coincides with the fact that at least two other persons have reported seeing a “football field” sized craft in that same vicinity.  they were reported to have been seen while the individuals were walking along woods chapel road, which is also in the aerial photo of the lake.

craft #1 travelled through the screen in 14 frames, or .23 seconds.  craft #2 travelled through the screen in 16 frames, or .27 seconds.   craft #3 took 27 frames do to its extra movements, in .45 seconds.

after calculating the speed of the first craft, it appears to have been travelling at a rate of 6 miles per second, or 21,734 mph.  of course all of this is based on the estimate that the craft were in the vicinity of lakewood lakes.  if they were in reality closer, then the speed and size would drop incrementally.  conversely, if they were further away, then the speed and size would be even larger. however, the logic of the sightings being captured over the precise location of the center of the larger of the two lakes is compelling.

summary:
this may be the first observation and video capture of craft operating in the vicinity of lakewood lakes.
content.summary: Jupiter fly-by

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room work on my laptop , was a big storm coming from west of illinois , the window was open because i was watching the thunder and there's was a big cloud look so white not like others and keep transparent to 4 white light look like big flower with small balls around the object and they were like moving around them self's like " they keep split and back again ... etc " for 4 or 5 minutes and after that diseapper behind the clouds .

note " its was big storm i feel like they was hiding behind the cloud but when the thunder hit they just appear "
content.summary: 4 white light was hiding behind the cloud .

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for mu husband to come home.  it was late and i was upset that he had not come home yet.  i went to the front of the house and sat on the arm of the sofa looking out of the big bay window watching for any signs of his car pulling up into the driveway.  i was looking up at the stars as some appeared to be exceptionally bright and a little bigger than the surrounding stars. as i kept starring at them, then suddenly began to sort of drop, then one, then two, then many, many more.   they began to move in a motion that appeared to be like right out of a hollywood movie of the wwii air fights with the japanese planes.  i watched for many minutes trying to figure out what it was that i was watching.  i then realized it was too high for our planes to be doing the type of maneuvers they were making.  i wanted to go to the phone and call my parents to look out their windows and see if they could see the same thing, but it was before cordless phones were popular and my dad had to get up at 3:00 a.M. to go to work for the post office and i was afraid to wake him up as well.  i was afraid that if i left the window i'd lose sight of them, so i stayed and then, as quickly as it started, it stopped.

my heart was racing.  i thought, omg, is this the end of the world???  i recall anxiously grabbing the morning paper to see if anybody had reported the sighting, but there was absolutely nothing in the paper.  nothing on the news at all.  i called my mom the next day and told her what i saw.  she said i should have called her so she could have witnessed it too.  

i have had a couple of other sightings of ufo's.  the next was up in the foothills of the sierras in calaveras county.  we were outside sitting by a camp fire watching the skies over toward the direction of area 51.  we saw many objects that were start like move quickly from east to west and from east to north west in a matter of a mili-second.  some would appear to be a single star-like shape, then would spilt into 3, then they would all fly off into different directions.

the last sighting was what i call, a giant mother-like ship that was black, like a shadow.  again in calaveras county approximately in the late 1990's.  we were all out on the hot tub deck looking outside when we saw an object flying very low, perhaps just above the tree tops.  it flew very slow, but what was so weird was it had a spot light and it was in a search like mode.  moving in a slow, sweeping motion.  it would come on, then the light would go out.  the ship moved continually forward from the north towards the south.  it flew directly over the house.  we would see its under belly.  no windows, no lights.  it looked like right out of the star wars movie.  not smooth at all.  the search light was off until it moved passed the house , then came back on looking for who knows what????  there was no wind, no sound, nothing.  it was huge.  then, it flew over the ridge and out of sight, but then in about maybe 20 minutes, we saw it again further east of us doing the same thing--search light and moving very slowly north.  we watched it fly out of sight again, never saw it again.
content.summary: Wwii air dog fight in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My name is albatros dreshaj im 22 years old and currently live in laconia, nh. even before this experience i believed in the paranormal/ufo phenomena. anyways, my story started off at my college (new england college) patiently waiting for my father to come get me for the weekend because i chose to dorm at school there on the weekdays and see my family on the weekends. around 6:00 p.M my father had arrived at my campus and we began our hour trip back home. the ride back home was as the same as every other time, the only difference was that it was mid november and a little chilly outside so i had felt no need to roll down any window as it was a clear evening. entering into exit 20 (which leads to laconia) we stopped by a gas station to pick up some snacks. about a minute later we got back into the car and started to drive past tilton, nh within seconds entering winnasquam/belmont, nh. sitting in the passenger seat (time being 7:43-7:45pm) i played my part as a passenger and always scoped the areas around while thoughts would run through my head non-stop. entering belmont, i felt the need and also just randomly looked up towards the north-east side of where i was sitting to observe the beauty of the night sky and the water below the bridge we were driving on when all of a sudden coming from south of where we were positioned, i noticed (probably about 1 mile above the car and a few feet in the air to my right) a object moving ninja-swift-like over the lake which eventually i ended up losing sight of it over some trees to the left of the car which was miles of woods if you were to even try and get a chance to chase it. i noticed when it came into my view that this "flying mechanism" was not a helicopter nor a plane because i debunked them off the theory because no such plane or helicopter would have moved silently so low towards the earth and the fact that i only had about 4 seconds to get as much scoping out of the object as i could, i was able to make out some characteristics which eventually gave me an idea of what i might have been looking at considering how swift and silent this object was traveling and 4 lights from the bottom that i saw. the lights that i saw from the bottom of the object is what made me later go home and sketch out a triangular probably about 30-40 feet in diameter and the positioning of the lights from when i was observing it from the car it made me immediately decode that this object was definitely a triangular knife-like machine just moving swiftly like a steak knife cutting thru butter in the air. the strange thing was that at the moment of the sighting, i felt like i was paralyzed, shocked-in-aw during the observation and that i was debating to myself what i was seeing and after what i saw. i could not believe what i had seen neither could i convince myself that i might of just had my own experience. here in nh there's no one to run to and tell the story to with out telling yourself to think twice about what your gonna say and that mufon was the only thing i could turn to and possibly not sound crazy. the sighting does not surprise me at all as nh is famous for ufo sightings and abductions. i don't know if any other vehicles in front of me or behind spotted it as well but all i know is i know what i saw, and what i saw believe it or not was proof that we really are not alone. seriously though, billions of galaxy's and people think there is no one else.. you would be an idiot and crazy to try and convince yourself that. that is my experience and thank you for letting me come out with it with out feeling like a lunatic, even tho either way i still do feel like one just talking about it.
content.summary: Black-triangular-4-light-silent-object

content.detailedDescription:

 i first thought as a marine core serviceman's wife how could something so huge not set off military airspace alarms because it appeared well within the 2,mile coastal boundary.

the craft did not directly harm me to my knowledge; my ex husband however was escalating his physical assaults.

 my intuition was that it was powerful air unit of unknown origin. i survived many, many traumatic falls, battering altercations, even abandonment; eventually, he broke my neck. i have lived by god's grace, to witness many miraculous events. i couldn't this sighting no less miraculous.

 i have no snapshots, and this is well before,"selfies," were a daily pastime in our culture worldwide. i'm an artist and my be able to supply with a zket h in dye time. my art began to take on aa cujbic dimension many years years later.

sincerely, carol cohen(i receive mail with alias justice bennett dye to the nature if my 1st marriage.) you may publish justice bennett.) stella valentine was my paternal grandmother.Hence, []

i have a rapist still living
in this present city,;this is my concern regarding my real name.  was contacted by cid nas whidbey,"we are not allowed to tell you to run; so, when are you going to disapper?"

i have been waiting to share this information for quite some time. i hope it ori ides you with enough detail.I'm typing on my cell phone, please forgive typos.I do also remember that moving to the new city there were high concentrations of quarts crystal that were brought by the children to my door. i don't know if that is important. this city in 1 hour and 20 .I ute drive from oak harbor sighting.

one more thing, i'm since tg, since the above described  event, i'm hypersensitive to electric current.(vibrations&and auditory)since then i have suffered from a severe condition on palms and soles. my fingerprints are literally uprooted. 

it may be what some term morgellions. what i recognize is the hyoerfragility and friability and subsequent regeneration, is an extremely rapid cycle. i'm hoping to eventually find a computer that will be less volitile to my hands.Thank you mufon. i appreciate your time and efforts in your research and findings.
content.summary: Black cube, sharp defined edves, lights inside shonninh outwrd ,mass wi dos,; moving like cruise ship steady, silent, blo ked out the sun. incalcuble icey cold as is passed by. surface appeared as massive densely packed working visable circuit board..

content.detailedDescription: While walking the dog i stopped at the corner to wait for her and just turned to the side where some birds were chirping in a tree, winter was late and seemed rather cold, above the tree there were two shapes of worm like entities intertwining with each other with 90 degree angles, they floated farther away probably closer to the river, i stood there watching them for a while and then noticed that they weren't leaving they appeared to be moving constantly. since my dog ran off farther down the path i slowly began to follow her and kept turning back to check if they were still there, after returning home i checked through the window and they seemed to remain there through the night ... i never saw them leave, but strangely i never saw them arrive ether, its as though they just faded out of sight ...
content.summary: Two intertwining worms floating in the air and shifting in 90 degree angles

content.detailedDescription:
On thanksgiving night 2009, i went outside after dinner with my wife and friend to smoke a cigarette outside of my house.  i looked up at the sky and noticed eight large amber colored spherical lights about the size of a full moon directly above my house.  they were at cloud level so approximately 500-1000 feet up and stayed stationary for approximately 90 minutes.  they did not move but they did fade in and out so that some lights would go dark while others stayed lit.  this continued periodically and at times they would all remain lit until after about 90 minutes there was only one light that remained lit and it drifted north into the horizon until we could no longer see it.  the light that drifted north did not move at a rapid speed, i would estimate that it moved about 200 miles/hour similar to an airplane.  

we live under a main flight path in san diego and i saw several airplanes and helicopters fly by the area but there seemed to be no change of path for the aircraft due to the lights. i took several photos and videos on my digital camera of the lights but after the event when i went inside to view them the camera was dead even though i still had a 75% full battery while taking the photos. there was only one photo that remained on my phone but only one small light showed on the picture.  when i zoomed in on the light it seemed to have a mushroom shape but the image was too fuzzy to tell what it was.  i have seen chinese lanterns and these were definitely not them since they stayed stationary for 90 minutes despite a 10-15 mph westerly wind, they also weren't flares since there was no smoke eminating and they did not drop in elevation.  i have no idea what they were but i have never seen anything like them since.  i was not scared of the objects, they almost seemed to give me a sense of peace. 

the next day i spoke to a friend of mine that lived about three blocks away and he brought them up to me before i even mentioned them to him.  he described the same thing to me but from his angle they seemed to have more of a triangular pattern, where i only saw a random pattern of lights.  we both checked the news networks online but did not see any reports of what happened.
content.summary: 8 amber lights about the size of a full moon directly over my house
